data.name: KanjiToYomiNotSupported
data.value: Kanji to Yomi conversion is not supported.

data.name: NoteVoiceSettingsDefaultWaveformTooltip
data.value: This is the basic waveform for the timbre.

data.name: NoteVoiceSettingsAttackTooltip
data.value: Time in seconds for the sound to reach maximum volume.

data.name: NoteVoiceSettingsDecayTooltip
data.value: Time in seconds to decay from maximum volume to sustain level.

data.name: NoteVoiceSettingsSustainTooltip
data.value: Volume level while the sound persists (0-1).

data.name: NoteVoiceSettingsReleaseTooltip
data.value: Time in seconds for the sound to fade after the note is released.

data.name: NoteVoiceSettingsBandlimitedSynthTooltip
data.value: Enabling reduces aliasing noise but slightly increases CPU load.

data.name: InvalidOrExistingModelNameError
data.value: Model name is invalid or already exists.

data.name: SampleRateTooltip
data.value: The number of times audio is sampled per second. Higher values improve sound quality but increase CPU load. CD quality is 44100Hz.

data.name: MasterVolumeTooltip
data.value: Adjusts the master volume for the entire application. Set within the range of 0 (mute) to 1 (maximum).

data.name: EnableNormalizationTooltip
data.value: Automatically adjusts the volume to prevent clipping and equalize the overall volume.

data.name: NormalizationThresholdTooltip
data.value: The volume threshold at which normalization activates. Normalization is applied when this value is exceeded.

data.name: NormalizationLevelTooltip
data.value: The target volume level after normalization.

data.name: EnableGlobalFadeOutTooltip
data.value: Smoothly fades out the sound at the end of playback to prevent abrupt cutoffs.

data.name: FadeOutTimeTooltip
data.value: The duration of the fade-out in seconds.

data.name: RenderingModeTooltip
data.value: Selects the audio rendering method. Realtime mode has lower latency but may slightly reduce quality. GPU mode requires a compatible graphics card and may incur data transfer overhead.

data.name: BufferSizeTooltip
data.value: The number of audio samples processed at once. Smaller values reduce latency but increase CPU load and may cause dropouts.

data.name: MaxPolyphonyTooltip
data.value: The maximum number of notes that can be played simultaneously. Exceeding this value may cause older notes to stop sounding.

data.name: MaxThreadsTooltip
data.value: The maximum number of CPU threads used for audio processing. Typically

data.name: InitialSyncDurationTooltip
data.value: The playback duration (in seconds) loaded synchronously when the file is opened. Longer times increase initial wait but reduce processing during playback.

data.name: GpuAccelerationTooltip
data.value: Experimental feature. Uses the GPU to accelerate parts of the audio processing. Requires a compatible graphics card.

data.name: GpuSynthesisTooltip
data.value: Uses the GPU for waveform synthesis processing.

data.name: GpuEqualizerTooltip
data.value: Uses the GPU for equalizer processing.

data.name: GpuEffectsChainTooltip
data.value: Uses the GPU to process multiple effects (reverb

data.name: GpuConvolutionReverbTooltip
data.value: Uses the GPU to process high-quality convolution reverb.

data.name: EnableParallelProcessingTooltip
data.value: Utilizes CPU multi-cores to execute audio processing per channel in parallel

data.name: DefaultTempoTooltip
data.value: The default tempo used if the MIDI file does not contain tempo information. Specified in microseconds per quarter note (e.g., 120BPM = 500000).

data.name: PitchBendRangeTooltip
data.value: Sets the range of pitch bend in semitones. For example, setting it to 2 allows pitch bending within a range of ±2 semitones.

data.name: MinVelocityTooltip
data.value: The minimum velocity for notes to be processed. Notes with lower velocity will be ignored. Useful for removing unwanted low-volume notes.

data.name: ProcessControlChangesTooltip
data.value: Processes Control Change messages such as volume and pan.

data.name: ProcessPitchBendTooltip
data.value: Processes Pitch Bend messages to smoothly change the pitch.

data.name: ProcessProgramChangesTooltip
data.value: Processes Program Change messages to switch instrument sounds.

data.name: ExcludedChannelsTooltip
data.value: MIDI channels specified here will be ignored during playback (comma separated).

data.name: ExcludedTracksTooltip
data.value: Tracks specified here will be ignored during playback (comma separated).

data.name: EnableSfzTooltip
data.value: Plays MIDI using SFZ format sampler instruments. If enabled

data.name: SfzSearchPathTooltip
data.value: Specify the path to the folder to search for SFZ files.

data.name: UseDefaultSoundFontTooltip
data.value: Uses the default SoundFont (GeneralUser-GS.sf2) included with the plugin.

data.name: FallbackToSynthesisCheckbox
data.value: Fallback to synthesis if SoundFont is not found

data.name: FallbackToSynthesisTooltip
data.value: Switches to playback with the built-in synthesizer if a suitable SoundFont is not found.

data.name: SoundFontDirectoryTooltip
data.value: The path to the directory containing user-added SoundFont files.

data.name: PreferredSoundFontTooltip
data.value: Specify the SoundFont filename to prioritize even if it doesn't match the rules.

data.name: SoundFontLayersGroupHeader
data.value: SoundFont Layers (Used stacked, prioritized from top)

data.name: SoundFontListGroupHeader
data.value: Available SoundFonts and Rules (Double-click to edit)

data.name: DefaultWaveformTooltip
data.value: Select the basic waveform type for the timbre.

data.name: WavetableDirectoryTooltip
data.value: Folder to place user-defined WAV files.

data.name: A4FrequencyTooltip
data.value: Sets the frequency of the reference note A4 (La). The modern standard is 440Hz

data.name: MinFrequencyTooltip
data.value: The lower limit of the frequency of the generated audio. Frequencies below this will be clipped.

data.name: MaxFrequencyTooltip
data.value: The upper limit of the frequency of the generated audio. Frequencies above this will be clipped.

data.name: EnvelopeScaleTooltip
data.value: Adjusts the time scale of the ADSR envelope (attack

data.name: DefaultEnvelopeTooltip
data.value: Sets the default values for the temporal change of sound (ADSR).

data.name: AttackTooltip
data.value: Time (in seconds) from the start of the sound until it reaches maximum volume.

data.name: DecayTooltip
data.value: Time (in seconds) to decay from maximum volume to the sustain level.

data.name: SustainTooltip
data.value: The volume level while the note is held (0-1).

data.name: ReleaseTooltip
data.value: Time (in seconds) for the sound to fade out after the note is released.

data.name: FmSourceTooltip
data.value: Settings related to FM synthesis method.

data.name: ModulatorFrequencyTooltip
data.value: The frequency of the modulating wave in FM synthesis. Makes the timbre more complex.

data.name: ModulationIndexTooltip
data.value: The depth of modulation in FM synthesis. Larger values result in more complex and metallic timbres.

data.name: EnableBandlimitedSynthesisTooltip
data.value: Enables techniques to reduce aliasing (folding noise) during waveform generation. Improves sound quality but slightly increases CPU load.

data.name: EnableAntiPopTooltip
data.value: Applies short fades at the start and end of notes to reduce 'pop' noises.

data.name: EnableNoteCrossfadeTooltip
data.value: Smoothes transitions between notes to reduce noise.

data.name: EffectsTabTooltip
data.value: Configure various effects to adjust audio quality.

data.name: CompressorTooltip
data.value: An effect that suppresses volume variations and increases sound pressure.

data.name: CompressorThresholdTooltip
data.value: The volume threshold at which the compressor starts working.

data.name: CompressorRatioTooltip
data.value: The ratio at which sound exceeding the threshold is compressed. E.g.

data.name: CompressorAttackTooltip
data.value: The time (in seconds) it takes for the compressor to start working.

data.name: CompressorReleaseTooltip
data.value: The time (in seconds) it takes for the compressor to release.

data.name: AlgorithmicReverbTooltip
data.value: A high-quality reverb that generates reverberation through calculations.

data.name: ConvolutionReverbTooltip
data.value: Uses an Impulse Response (IR) file to reproduce realistic reverberation.

data.name: MaxIrDurationTooltip
data.value: Specify the maximum load time for the impulse response file in seconds.

data.name: DistortionTooltip
data.value: Distorts the sound to create a powerful sound.

data.name: BitCrusherTooltip
data.value: Intentionally degrades sound quality to create a retro sound.

data.name: PingPongDelayTooltip
data.value: A delay that creates an echo effect alternating between left and right channels.

data.name: DelayTimeTooltip
data.value: The interval of the echo (in seconds).

data.name: FeedbackTooltip
data.value: The number of times the echo repeats.

data.name: MixTooltip
data.value: The balance between the original sound (dry) and the effect sound (wet).

data.name: ChorusTooltip
data.value: Adds thickness and width to the sound by slightly detuning and layering it.

data.name: ChorusDelayTooltip
data.value: The delay time (in seconds) of the layered sound against the original sound.

data.name: ChorusDepthTooltip
data.value: The depth of the sound modulation.

data.name: ChorusRateTooltip
data.value: The speed of the sound modulation (in Hz).

data.name: ChorusStrengthTooltip
data.value: The strength of the chorus sound relative to the original sound.

data.name: PhaserTooltip
data.value: An effect that creates a unique swirling sound by shifting the phase of the sound.

data.name: PhaserRateTooltip
data.value: The speed at which the phase is changed (in Hz).

data.name: PhaserStagesTooltip
data.value: The number of filter stages in the phaser. More stages create a more complex effect.

data.name: PhaserFeedbackTooltip
data.value: The amount of the effect sound fed back into the input. Emphasizes the effect.

data.name: FlangerRateTooltip
data.value: The speed of the swirl (in Hz).

data.name: LimiterTooltip
data.value: Limits the volume from exceeding a certain threshold

data.name: LimiterThresholdTooltip
data.value: The upper limit to restrict the volume.

data.name: EqualizerTooltip
data.value: Adjusts sound quality by boosting or cutting specific frequency bands.

data.name: EqBassGainTooltip
data.value: Adjusts the gain (volume) of the bass range.

data.name: EqMidGainTooltip
data.value: Adjusts the gain (volume) of the mid range.

data.name: EqTrebleGainTooltip
data.value: Adjusts the gain (volume) of the treble range.

data.name: EnableDcOffsetRemovalTooltip
data.value: Removes the direct current component (DC offset) from the audio signal. Prevents unwanted noise and distortion.

data.name: InstrumentTabTooltip
data.value: Configure timbre settings according to MIDI program numbers.

data.name: InstrumentPresetTabTooltip
data.value: Assign timbre settings to a range of MIDI program numbers.

data.name: InstrumentCustomTabTooltip
data.value: Assign individual timbre settings to specific MIDI program numbers. Set to -1 for percussion channel (10).

data.name: DebugTabTooltip
data.value: Settings for debugging to help investigate issues.

data.name: EnableLoggingTooltip
data.value: Outputs plugin operation logs to a file. Useful for investigating issues.

data.name: LogFilePathTooltip
data.value: Specify the output path for the log file.

data.name: MaxLogSizeTooltip
data.value: Specify the maximum log file size in KB. Older logs are deleted when this limit is exceeded.

data.name: LogLevelTooltip
data.value: Set the detail level of the logs to output. Set in the range 1 (errors only) to 5 (all).

data.name: EnableNamedPipeApiCheckbox
data.value: Enable Named Pipe API (for external integration)

data.name: ShowMidiInfoWindowCheckbox
data.value: Show MIDI info window when adding MIDI file

data.name: OpenMidiEditorCheckbox
data.value: Open MIDI editor when adding MIDI file

data.name: RefreshFilesTooltip
data.value: Update the SFZ and SoundFont file lists.

data.name: ReloadConfigTooltip
data.value: Reloads the current settings from the file. Unsaved changes will be discarded.

data.name: Key_VersionNewAvailable
data.value: 新しいバージョンが利用可能です: {0}

data.name: Key_VersionUpToDate
data.value: Your version is up to date.

data.name: MidiWriterQuantizeTooltip
data.value: Which note value to align MIDI event timing to. 'None' disables quantization.

data.name: MidiWriterPitchAlgoTooltip
data.value: Method to detect pitch from audio. YIN is more accurate but takes longer to process.

data.name: MidiWriterPitchSensitivityTooltip
data.value: How much pitch stability is required. Higher values detect more notes. (0.0-1.0)

data.name: MidiWriterFftSizeTooltip
data.value: Number of samples for frequency analysis. Larger values increase frequency resolution but decrease time resolution.

data.name: MidiWriterMinNoteDurationTooltip
data.value: Minimum length (ms) of detected MIDI notes. Excludes notes that are too short.

data.name: MidiWriterVelocitySensitivityTooltip
data.value: Degree to which volume changes are reflected in MIDI velocity. Higher values emphasize volume changes. (0.0-1.0)

data.name: MidiWriterNote1
data.value: • This feature is experimental. Accuracy depends heavily on the audio content and settings.

data.name: MidiWriterNote2
data.value: • Monophonic instruments or voices are converted more accurately than chords or complex sources.

data.name: MidiWriterNote3
data.value: • Processing time increases proportionally to the audio length and FFT size.

data.name: SelectUtauFolderTitle
data.value: Select the folder containing UTAU voices
